content: Envisioned to clearly communicate a process of evaluating vendor performance, thanks to an Operations team for leading and pushing this project forward
Considered and worked towards ease of use in a clear visualization, and iterated on user feedback to further improve on a clear message
Led technical implementation with cross team collaboration- from IT, data scientists, and UX design- and devised this solution based on team structure, security, and error handling
Gamified system includes performance badges in four categories: Gold, Silver, Bronze, and Trial. These badges represent performance levels in specific service areas.
Badge design reflects the metallic essence of gold, silver, and bronze awards
Combines an indicator marker and a ribbon with a metallic color to emphasize the temporary nature of the badge with the design, designed for dynamic, monthly updates instead of permanent recognition
Flexible badge design, can be displayed horizontally in tables
I collaborated with a designer on my vision for badges, a big thank you!
